channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Sitemap Page
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Sitemap Page

item.title: CVE-2021-24715|2024-08-03T19:42:16.609Z -- unknown -- wp%20sitemap%20page
item.description: The WP Sitemap Page WordPress plugin before 1.7.0 does not properly sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
